* grpc: [https://uptick-testnet.grpc.kjnodes.com](https://uptick-testnet.grpc.kjnodes.com)


**addrbook**
```bash
curl -Ls https://snapshots.kjnodes.com/uptick-testnet/addrbook.json > $HOME/.uptickd/config/addrbook.json
```
